meanings.sent1: My parens always support me and love me unconditionally.
meanings.sent2: The parens of the newborn baby were overjoyed with their new arrival.
meanings.sent3: During the family picnic, my parens challenged me to a friendly game of soccer.
meanings.sent4: The parens of the school worked together to ensure a successful fundraiser.
meanings.sent5: In the storybook, the young hero was guided by the wisdom of their parens.

meanings.definition: A pair of parentheses used in writing or printing to set off or enclose a word or group of words.
meanings.sent1: Please put the extra information in parens at the end of the sentence.
meanings.sent2: The mathematical equation required the use of parens to clarify the order of operations.
meanings.sent3: The recipe called for a pinch of salt (parens) to enhance the flavor.
meanings.sent4: The author used parens to create a side note for the readers to consider.
meanings.sent5: In the coding class, the students learned how to properly use parens in their programming assignments.
